screen.applet: from enigma import eSize, ePoint from skin import getSkinFactor f = getSkinFactor() textTopMargin = int(82*f) textsize = self["text"].getSize() textsize = (textsize[0], max(textsize[1], int(53*f)) + int(50*f)) itemHeight = int(26*f) lenlist = min(len(self.list),5) * itemHeight self["text"].instance.resize(eSize(textsize[0],min(textsize[1], int(570*f)))) if self.type == self.TYPE_YESNO: listsize = (int(660*f), lenlist) if lenlist + textsize[1] > int(570*f): self["list"].instance.move(ePoint(int(695*f), int(410*f))) self["list"].instance.resize(eSize(int(575*f),int(lenlist))) else: self["list"].instance.move(ePoint(int(10*f), int(textTopMargin + textsize[1]))) self["list"].instance.resize(eSize(*listsize))

screen.name: MessageBoxSimple
screen.applet: from enigma import eSize, ePoint from skin import getSkinFactor f = getSkinFactor() if self.timerRunning: titleheight = int(20*f) else: titleheight = 0 self.setTitle("") orgwidth = self.instance.size().width() orgheight = self.instance.size().height() orgpos = self.instance.position() textsize = self["text"].getSize() textsize = (textsize[0] + int(50*f), textsize[1] + int(20*f)) wsizex = textsize[0] + int(60*f) wsizey = textsize[1] itemHeight = int(25*f) lenlist = len(self.list) * itemHeight if (lenlist > int(125*f)): lenlist = int(125*f) if (int(64*f) > wsizey): wsizey = int(64*f) if self.type == self.TYPE_YESNO: wsizey += lenlist + int(10*f) if (int(280*f) > wsizex): wsizex = int(280*f) wsize = (wsizex, wsizey + titleheight) self.instance.resize(eSize(*wsize)) self["text"].instance.move(ePoint(int(64*f), int(8*f + titleheight))) self["text"].instance.resize(eSize(*textsize)) self["ErrorPixmap"].instance.move(ePoint(int(4*f), int(4*f + titleheight))) self["ErrorPixmap"].instance.resize(eSize(int(53*f),int(53*f))) self["QuestionPixmap"].instance.move(ePoint(int(4*f), int(4*f + titleheight))) self["QuestionPixmap"].instance.resize(eSize(int(53*f),int(53*f))) self["InfoPixmap"].instance.move(ePoint(int(4*f), int(4*f + titleheight))) self["InfoPixmap"].instance.resize(eSize(int(53*f),int(53*f))) if self.type == self.TYPE_YESNO: listsize = (wsizex-6, lenlist) self["list"].instance.move(ePoint(3, int(wsizey - lenlist + titleheight - 3))) self["list"].instance.resize(eSize(*listsize)) newwidth = wsize[0] self.instance.move(ePoint(int(orgpos.x() + (orgwidth - newwidth) // 2), int(orgpos.y() + (orgheight - wsizey) // 2)))
